content.en: Optimizing Renewable Energy: Researchers have developed various algorithms to optimize the performance of power systems and converters in renewable energy systems. These algorithms, such as adaptive sliding-mode control and integral sliding mode control, use advanced techniques to regulate power, improve system design, enhance transient performance, and reduce computation time delay. By applying these algorithms, the researchers aim to improve the efficiency and stability of renewable energy systems, such as photovoltaic and wind power systems.
content.da: Optimering af vedvarende energi: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at optimere ydeevnen af kraftsystemer og konvertere i vedvarende energisystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom adaptiv sliding-mode kontrol og integral sliding-mode kontrol, anvender avancerede teknikker til at regulere strømmen, forbedre systemdesign, forbedre overgangsydelsen og reducere beregningstidens forsinkelse. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten og stabiliteten af vedvarende energisystemer, såsom fotovoltaiske og vindkraftsystemer.
